diacheck.java.libs.imageTools

Class FieldFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • diacheck.java.libs.imageTools.FieldFinder

  • public class FieldFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Fieldfinder is a class for locating specific data fields within an image. Image data is passed to the constructor as a BufferedImage object, and the search for the field is initiated through the method locateField()
    Author:
    Anton Österberg
